trends: There has been one other sighting in Panora
There were no other sightings in Panora on or around January 19th 1989
Summary: I watched the disk as it hovered and used some kind of light as search lights to scan the ground.
divs: sighting detailsi was on hwy 4, driving south from visiting my father in the hospital in jefferson, iowa. as i approached my home town of panora, approximately 2 to 3 miles away, i noticed what i thought was an airplane flying extremely low. i told my daughter (15) that i thought it was in trouble and going to crash. it was straight in front of us. it did not move like a plane and i thought then it was a helicopter. the odd thing was, there were no blinking lights. upon arriving on the north side of town (a town of aprox. 1000) i told my daughter, "do you know what we are seeing?". i knew it was a ufo. i pulled over to the side of the road and watched it hover just above the trees to the south and east of me, about 1\2 mile or less. (i'm not good with distance), it was very, very close. i got out of the car and went to the east side of the road, over the ditch and stood watching it. the object was huge, probably at least the size of a football field if it were round. it had big windows and 3 of the windows were lit. there was not one sound, the tree tops were not even swaying. there is a farm house at this location and the object was using what i would describe as search lights from the under side, moving back and forth as if searching for something. i was very excited, i waved at it, and when i did, the lights went out. my daughter was very frightened and objected to me waving at it. the object remained there about 8 minutes and then left the way it had come. it went out of sight like in a few seconds. i went home and told my husband what we'd seen and told him it would be in the news, as i couldn't possibly be the only one who saw it. it was in the news that night, but they reported that several people had seen a bright light in the sky. norad had said it was a piece of a russian satilite falling and burning to earth. i know that is a lie. i was so very close to this object and it did not fall. i did not believe in ufo's until this experience. i know now. i will never forget it.
